entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 33. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
